concept.title: Diameter Peer configuration, white-listing, profiles, and tools

section.title: Overview
section.p: The NCC supports configuring the interaction of Diameter peers and the NCC. NCC provides configurable peer connection profiles, peer white-listing and peer status to control Diameter traffic.
An operator can manage the Diameter peers using the Diameter Peers tab on the SM GUI. See the "NCC Diameter User Guide" for more information.
